:visible.description: Whether the drawer is visible or not

default-visible.description: Whether the drawer is visible by default (uncontrolled mode)
default-visible.description_zh: 抽屉默认是否可见（非受控模式）

mask.description: Whether or not to display the mask layer

mask-closable.description: Click to see if the mask layer can be turned off
mask-closable.description_zh: 点击遮罩层是否可以关闭

closable.description: Whether or not to display a close button

ok-text.description: Confirm the contents of the button

cancel-text.description: The contents of the cancel button

ok-loading.description: Check whether the button is loading
ok-loading.description_zh: 确认按钮是否为加载中状态

:ok-button-props.description: Confirm the Props of the button

:cancel-button-props.description: Cancel the Props of the button

unmount-on-close.description: Whether to unmount the node when it is shut down

width.description: Width of drawer (only available when placement is right, left)
width.description_zh: 抽屉的宽度（仅在placement为right,left时可用）

height.description: Height of drawer (only available when placement is top, bottom)
height.description_zh: 抽屉的高度（仅在placement为top,bottom时可用）

esc-to-close.description: Whether the ESC key is supported to close the drawer
esc-to-close.description_zh: 是否支持 ESC 键关闭抽屉

render-to-body.description: Whether the drawer is mounted under the body element
render-to-body.description_zh: 抽屉是否挂载在 body 元素下

footer.description: Whether to show the bottom content

hide-cancel.description: Whether to hide the cancel button

events.name: before-ok
events.description: The callback function before the OK event is triggered. If it returns false, no subsequent events will be triggered, and you can also use done to close asynchronously.
events.description_zh: 触发 ok 事件前的回调函数。如果返回 false 则不会触发后续事件，也可使用 done 进行异步关闭。
events.params: ( done: (closed: boolean) => void) => void | boolean | Promise<void | boolean>

events.name: before-cancel
events.description: The callback function before the cancel event is triggered. If false is returned, no subsequent event will be triggered.
events.description_zh: 触发 cancel 事件前的回调函数。如果返回 false 则不会触发后续事件。

events.name: ok
events.description: Triggered when the OK button is clicked

events.name: cancel
events.description: Triggered when you click the cancel or close buttons
events.description_zh: 点击取消、关闭按钮时触发

events.name: open
events.description: Triggers when the drawer is opened (at the end of the animation).
events.description_zh: 抽屉打开后（动画结束）触发

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the drawer is closed (the animation ends).
events.description_zh: 抽屉关闭后（动画结束）触发

events.name: before-close
events.description: Triggered before the dialog box closes

DrawerConfig.name: maskClosable
DrawerConfig.description: 点击遮罩层是否可以关闭

DrawerConfig.name: okLoading
DrawerConfig.description: 确认按钮是否为加载中状态

DrawerConfig.name: width
DrawerConfig.description: 抽屉的宽度（仅在placement为right,left时可用）

DrawerConfig.name: height
DrawerConfig.description: 抽屉的高度（仅在placement为top,bottom时可用）

DrawerConfig.name: onCancel
DrawerConfig.description: 点击取消、关闭按钮时触发

DrawerConfig.name: onBeforeOk
DrawerConfig.type: ( done: (closed: boolean) => void ) => void | boolean | Promise<void | boolean>
DrawerConfig.description: 触发 ok 事件前的回调函数。如果返回 false 则不会触发后续事件，也可使用 done 进行异步关闭。

DrawerConfig.name: onBeforeCancel
DrawerConfig.description: 触发 cancel 事件前的回调函数。如果返回 false 则不会触发后续事件。

DrawerConfig.name: onOpen
DrawerConfig.description: 抽屉打开后（动画结束）触发

DrawerConfig.name: onClose
DrawerConfig.description: 抽屉关闭后（动画结束）触发

DrawerConfig.name: escToClose
DrawerConfig.description: 是否支持 ESC 键关闭抽屉
